Desc.eng: Van Helsing! I never thought I’d be glad to see you. Would you like to help me out with a ritual?
It’s nothing, really. I need the heart of an ancient Ghoul. The creature must be summoned in a pentacle. Summon the monster, kill it and bring me its heart!
Are you preparing something tasty from the Necromancer’s Cookbook?
How could you honestly believe that I would help you with this? And don’t even try it yourself, because I’m going to stop you.
You are pathetic! A weakling and a fool! You can’t stop me!
Great. I always wanted to dabble in the dark arts. Know your enemies, right?
Now we are talking! Prepare to die!
